code: var data = [];var labelData = [];for (var i = 0; i < 100; ++i) {    data.push({        value: Math.random() * 10 + 10 - Math.abs(i - 12),        name: i + ':00'    });    labelData.push({        value: 1,        name: i ,        itemStyle:{            normal: {                color: "#333"            }        }    });}for(var i=0;i<labelData.length;++i){    if(labelData[i].name < 60){        labelData[i].itemStyle = {            normal: {             color: "rgb(248, 237, 133)"         }        }    }}option = {    backgroundColor:'#000',    title: {        text: '60%',        left: '50%',          textAlign: 'center',        top: '45%',        textStyle:{            fontSize:60,            color:'#fff'        }    },    series: [{        hoverAnimation:false,        type: 'pie',        data: labelData,        radius: ['45%', '60%'],        itemStyle: {            normal: {                borderWidth:2,                borderColor: 'black'            }        },        label: {            normal: {                position: 'inside',                show:false,            }        }    }]};
